channel.title: 🏢 NAVER AI Lab on NeurIPS 2024
channel.description: Recent content in 🏢 NAVER AI Lab on NeurIPS 2024

item.title: Polyhedral Complex Derivation from Piecewise Trilinear Networks
item.description: This paper presents a novel method for analytically extracting meshes from neural implicit surface networks using trilinear interpolation, offering theoretical insights and practical efficiency.
